doc.field: Record Group 15. (RESTRICTED) Audiovisual (1950s-2008, undated; 26.42 linear feet)
Record Group 15. (RESTRICTED) Audiovisual (1950s-2008, undated; 26.42 linear feet)

21 reels of film, with previous inventory in box (which includes some reels in box 347. Dated reels are labeled: Trinity vs. EMA, 1959 (2 rolls); Fieldston vs. Friends, 1961 (2 rolls); Fieldston vs. Carteret, 1962; Fieldston vs. Brunswick, 1965; Fieldston vs. Locust Valley, 1965 (2 rolls); Fieldston vs. Collegiate, 1970 (color); Fieldston vs. Brunswick, 1970 (color). Undated reels are labeled: Fieldston vs. Trinity (2 reels) and a third reel of a different Trinity game; Fieldston vs. Englewood (2 rolls); Fieldston vs. Woodmere; Fieldston vs. Locust Valley. There are also 4 unlabeled reels, but detached labels in the box suggest that one of these is Fieldston vs. McBurney and another is Fieldston vs. Locust Valley, 1967 ("with George Martens, faculty member"). A third is possibly St. Bernard's (1960), listed on the original inventory as poor, and the fourth may be another Woodmere.
Record Group 15. (RESTRICTED) Audiovisual (1950s-2008, undated; 26.42 linear feet)
